joke.setup: This Unix geek is more than socially awkward...
joke.text: This Unix geek is more than socially awkward... He's socially perlward.

joke.punchline: They dont know how to join tables!
joke.setup: Why do frontend devs always eat alone?
joke.text: Why do frontend devs always eat alone? They dont know how to join tables!

lines: PM: Please write a parser for this language
Programmer: Sorry I can't, I have dyslexia.
